page.title: 05 RELIGIOUS DENOMINATIONS
page.content: Colwyn Bay has numerous places of religion.The churches and chapels serve varying denominations.These are the Church in Wales,Baptists, Methodists,Presbyterians,Catholics, Independant,Jehovah's Witness and Quakers. There are five Anglican churches. St.Paul's,situated on Abergele road is the parish church.This church was erected in 1888.It is built of local limestone faced with red sandstone. The church cost fourteen thousand pounds to build although it is now insured for three quarters of a million pounds.The organ has over three thousand pipes.The church is carpeted throughout and is heated by oil-fired central heating.The building can accommodate about six hundred people.From the top of the tower one can get an extensive view of the town.
